  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/624</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/624</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">El dia D: 6 de juny de 1944</string>
            <string language="en">D-Day: 6th June 1944</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">D-Tag: 6. Juni 1944</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jour J : 6ème Juin 1944</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">D-Dia: õ Junho 1944</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">D-Giorno: sesti Giugno del 1944</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέρα-μ: 6η Ιουνίου 1944</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) sobre què va succeir el dia 6 de juny de 1944 a Normandia i com va influir en l'evolució de la segona Guerra Mundial. Conté un enllaç per tal d'ampliar informació.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on what happened on 6th June 1944 in Normandy, and the way it influenced the course of the Second World War. A link for further information is included.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">segle XX</string>
            <string language="en">20th century</string>
            <string language="es">siglo XX</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">història contemporània</string>
            <string language="en">contemporary history</string>
            <string language="es">historia contemporánea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">segona guerra mundial</string>
            <string language="en">World War II</string>
            <string language="es">segunda guerra mundial</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frage und Antwort (GLEICHHEIT) auf, was an Juni 6.
1944 in Normandie geschah und die Methode er den Kurs des zweiten 
Weltkrieges beeinflußte. Ein Link für weitere Informationen 
ist enthalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Question et réponse (PAIR) sur ce qui s'est 
produit le 6 juin 1944 en Normandie, et la voie il a influencé le 
cours de la deuxième guerre mondiale. Un lien pour de plus 
amples informations est inclus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pergunta e resposta (PAR) em o que aconteceu em õ
junho 1944 em Normandy, e a maneira influenciou o curso da segunda 
guerra de mundo. Uma ligação para uma informação mais 
adicional é incluída.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risposta (PAR) su che cosa è accaduto 
il il 6 giugno 1944 in Normandia ed il modo ha influenzato il corso 
della seconda guerra mondiale. Un collegamento per ulteriori 
informazioni è incluso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) σε αυτά που συνέβησαν στις
6 Ιουνίου 1944 στη Νορμανδία, και τον τρόπο που επηρέασαν την 
πορεία του δεύτερου παγκόσμιου πολέμου. Μια σύνδεση 
συμπεριλαμβάνεται για περισσότερες πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">20. Jahrhundert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zeitgenössische Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zweiter Weltkrieg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">20ème siècle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire contemporaine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Deuxième guerre mondiale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">20o século</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">history contemporary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Segunda guerra mundial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ventesimo secolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">storia contemporanea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Seconda guerra mondiale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">20ός αιώνας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σύγχρονη ιστορία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παγκόσμιος πόλεμος ΙΙ</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
